title: refactor(http): extract duplicate hostname validation functions
body:
## Summary
Extract duplicate hostname validation logic in SocketHTTPClient.c into a single shared function.

## Problem
Two nearly identical functions exist for hostname validation:
- `hostname_safe()` at lines 810-819
- `prepared_hostname_safe()` at lines 2512-2521

Both perform security-critical validation to prevent hostname injection attacks.

## Location
- File: `src/http/SocketHTTPClient.c`
- Lines: 810-819 and 2512-2521

## Proposed Solution
Extract to single `httpclient_hostname_safe()` static function, or if useful elsewhere, add `SocketHTTP_URI_hostname_safe()` to `include/http/SocketHTTP.h`.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Single hostname validation function
- [ ] All callers updated to use shared function
- [ ] Tests pass with sanitizers
- [ ] ~10 lines saved

## Labels
refactor, redundancy, http
